ratings.en: The start of a story filled with love, life, and adventure!
The first trial! Doctor's gentle hug...
Love and tears from drawing blood... and the Devil laughed
A shocking night! An irregular occurrence of love!
A new girlfriend! A secret work-romance with the Devil!?
A fiery business trip night in Osaka! I'm here...
The Devil becomes an incarnation of jealousy.
Don't leave me... Finally a confession!
I like you... I... love you...!
I LOVE... Let us present the rest of the story
